verses.verse: The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

There was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4495>Manoah;<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H6135>barren,<s%> and <S%H3205>didn't<s%> bear.

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6135>her,<s%> "See now, you are barren, and <S%H3205>don't<s%> bear; but you shall <S%H2029>conceive,<s%> and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
Now therefore please <S%H8104>beware<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H398>don't<s%> eat any unclean <S%H2931>thing:<s%>

<S%H2030>for,<s%> behold, you shall conceive, and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and no <S%H4177>razor<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> on his <S%H7218>head;<s%> for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb:<s%> and he shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4758>me,<s%> and his face was like the <S%H4758>face<s%> of the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>awesome;<s%> and I <S%H7592>didn't<s%> ask him where he was <S%H5046>from,<s%> neither did he tell me his <S%H8034>name:<s%>

but he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2030>me,<s%> 'Behold, you shall conceive, and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and now <S%H7941>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> not any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H5288>thing;<s%> for the child shall be a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death.<s%>'"

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> please <S%H4994>let<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> whom you did <S%H7971>send<s%> come <S%H935>again<s%> to <S%H3384>us,<s%> and teach us what we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H5288>child<s%> who shall be <S%H3205>born.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H935>again<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> as she <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> but <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> wasn't with her.

The <S%H802>woman<s%> made <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Behold, the man has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H935>me,<s%> who came to me that <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

<S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Are you the man who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H802>woman?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am."
<S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now let your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H935>happen.<s%> What shall the <S%H5288>child<s%>'s <S%H4941>way<s%> of life and mission <S%H4639>be?<s%>"
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> "Of all that I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> let her <S%H8104>beware.<s%>

She may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of anything that <S%H3318>comes<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> neither let her <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H8354>drink,<s%> nor <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H6680>thing;<s%> all that I commanded her let her <S%H8104>observe.<s%>"

<S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6113>"Please,<s%> let us detain <S%H1423>you,<s%> that we may make a young goat <S%H6213>ready<s%> for <S%H6440>you.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> "Though you <S%H6113>detain<s%> <S%H398>me,<s%> I won't eat of your <S%H3899>bread;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a burnt <S%H6213>offering,<s%> you must <S%H6213>offer<s%> it to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" For <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that he was the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "What is your <S%H8034>name,<s%> that when your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H935>happen,<s%> we may honor <S%H3513>you?<s%>"
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7592>him,<s%> "Why do you ask about my <S%H8034>name,<s%> since it is <S%H6383>wonderful?<s%>"

So <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the young <S%H1423>goat<s%> with the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it on the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Then the angel <S%H6213>did<s%> a <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> thing as <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H7200>on.<s%>

For it <S%H3851>happened,<s%> when the flame went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward the <S%H8064>sky<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> in the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H7200>on;<s%> and they fell <S%H7200>on<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>didn't<s%> appear to <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> or to his <S%H802>wife<s%> any <S%H3254>more.<s%> Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H802>wife,<s%> "We shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> because we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3863>him,<s%> "If <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> were <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H3947>us,<s%> he wouldn't have received a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and a meal <S%H5930>offering<s%> at our <S%H3027>hand,<s%> neither would he have <S%H7200>shown<s%> us all these <S%H6256>things,<s%> nor would at this time have <S%H8085>told<s%> such things as <S%H2063>these.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034>him<s%> <S%H8123>Samson:<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> blessed <S%H1288>him.<s%>
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6470>move<s%> him in <S%H4264>Mahaneh<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> between <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol.<s%>
